SEARCH
Package albumcollection

Class Album

java.lang.Object
albumcollection.Album
public class Album extends Object
This class creates, defines the properties of, and manipulates an Album object. Supports adding ratings and computing average ratings for an Album object
Author:
Ved Patel, Vivek Manthri

      Parameterized constructor requires 4 parameters to create an album object

      title - the title of the album
      artist - the artist of the album
      genre - the genre of the album
      released - the release date of the album

    • avgRatings

      public double avgRatings()
      Computes the average ratings of an album
      Returns:
      a double representing the average rating or 0.0 if there are no ratings

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object obj)
      Determines if two Album objects are equal based on title and artist
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - the album object to be compared
      Returns:
      true if the titles and artists of the albums are the same; false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Return a textual representation of an Album object in a formatted manner
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a formatted string with Album object parameters, asterisks to display the rating scales, and average rating
